column2: Final dividend for the year ended December 31,2016 of'5.50 (December 31, 2015 of'5.50) per fully paid share
Dividends not recognised at the end of the reporting period

The directors have recommended the payment of a final dividend of'6.00 per fully paid equity share (December 31, 2016 -'5.50). This proposed dividend is subject to the approval of shareholders in the ensuing annual general meeting.
